alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Jefferson; Leon; Liberty; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 4:35PM EDT until April 05 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida... Northeastern Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... Jefferson County in Big Bend of Florida... Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... Northwestern Madison County in Big Bend of Florida... Southeastern Decatur County in southwestern Georgia... Grady County in southwestern Georgia... Thomas County in south central Georgia... Brooks County in south central Georgia... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 435 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Pelham to 8 miles southwest of Whigham to 6 miles southwest of Greensboro, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Monticello, Thomasville, Quincy, Tallahassee, Havana, Midway, Cairo, Quitman, Woodville, Boston, Ochlocknee, Pavo, Coolidge, Whigham, Florida State University, Tallahassee Comm College, Doak Campbell Stadium, Greensboro, Florida A And M and Gretna. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for south central and southwestern Georgia. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for south central and southwestern Georgia. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida.
